metadata.name: Clanza CR 200 mg 1 Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Ambroxol is indicated for secretolytic therapy in bronchoplmonary diseaes with abnormal mucus secretion and transport It allows the mucus to be more easily cleared and ease a patient s breathing

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Ambroxol can be decreased when it is combined with Pitolisant
The metabolism of Ambroxol can be increased when combined with Metreleptin
The serum concentration of Ambroxol can be decreased when it is combined with Cenobamate
The serum concentration of Ambroxol can be increased when it is combined with Ritonavir
The serum concentration of Haloperidol can be increased when it is combined with Ambroxol
The metabolism of Tucatinib can be decreased when combined with Ambroxol
The serum concentration of Ambroxol can be increased when it is combined with Abametapir
The serum concentration of Ambroxol can be decreased when it is combined with Satralizumab
